title: Enter does nothing
body:
When i press enter in game nothing happens at all, i tried resetting the game, resetting all controls to default and nothing changed?? Happens with both enter keys and obviously they work everywhere else.
 can't find any solutions on google (but ive seen others say they have the problem) please send help im out of ideas as to what to do.

replies.body:
Let's try manually resetting your config files really quickly before jumping to a reinstall. Those config files are also saved server side, so it's likely they were messed up and would just be redownloaded if all you did was a reinstall. Follow these steps exactly, and let me know if it doesn't help.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=FRRFjNAR,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-10-09T22:48:51.821+0000)
>
> Let's try manually resetting your config files really quickly before jumping to a reinstall. Those config files are also saved server side, so it's likely they were messed up and would just be redownloaded if all you did was a reinstall. Follow these steps exactly, and let me know if it doesn't help.
> 
> - Log into the game client
> - Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
> - Delete the folder named **Config**
> - Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
> - Leave game to sync settings

So i did this and it's fine until i alt-tab out of the game then it happens again, and since making my post i noticed that the cursor goes to the windows default cursor when it happens

Changing to the windows cursor would be normal if you alt+tab, since the main screen isn't League anymore after alt+tabbing. Honestly, try not to minimize League in the middle of a game, since that means you're *technically* AFK from the game and it could potentially interrupt your connection as well.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=FRRFjNAR,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-10-10T00:55:09.004+0000)
>
> Changing to the windows cursor would be normal if you alt+tab, since the main screen isn't League anymore after alt+tabbing. Honestly, try not to minimize League in the middle of a game, since that means you're *technically* AFK from the game and it could potentially interrupt your connection as well.


Sorry i mean when i open the game again the cursor doesn't go back to normal in-game it's still the default windows one and it stays that for the rest of the game. I usually only alt-tab out like once a match and it doesn't happen every time, but last night it went on for multiple games in a row some how? it's really strange...
The only way I ever found out how to fix this was to redownload the game, but that's really time consuming.
